genius.core.list

Class AbstractPermutations<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.list.AbstractImmutableList<ImmutableList<E>>
      • genius.core.list.AbstractPermutations<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - type of the elements
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImmutableList<ImmutableList<E>>, Permutations<E>, java.lang.Iterable<ImmutableList<E>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PermutationsOrderedWithoutReturn, PermutationsWithoutReturn, PermutationsWithReturn

    public abstract class AbstractPermutations<E>
extends AbstractImmutableList<ImmutableList<E>>
implements Permutations<E>
    Abstract base class for Permutations, common providing standard functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractPermutations(ImmutableList<E> list, int n)
      all permutations of a given list, drawing n items from the list

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractPermutations

        public AbstractPermutations(ImmutableList<E> list,
                            int n)
        all permutations of a given list, drawing n items from the list
        Parameters:
        list - list to be permuted
        n - the number of items to draw from the list. Must be between 0 and size of list.
